name: Cheeseburger
description: mit Salat, Cheddar, frischen Zwiebeln, eingelegten Gurken

name: Hamburger
description: Double Burger (ca. 260g) mit Rucola, Frischen Zwiebeln

name: Tripleburger
description: mit Salat, Cheddar, gebratenen Zwiebeln, frischen Gurken

name: Beef Bacon
description: Beef Patty, Cheddar Cheese, Grilled Onions & Tomatoes, Pickles, Lettuce, Katchup, Mayo, Mustard

name: Crispy Chicken
description: Crispy Chicken, Cheddar Cheese, Grilled Onion & Tomatoes, Lettuce, Pickles, Garlic Souce, Mayo, Chipotle Sauce

name: Lazeezo
description: Double Beef Patty, HashBrown, Double Cheese, Grilled Onion & Tomatoes, Pickles, Lettuce, Mayo, Katchup, Mustard, Chipotle Sauce

name: Brownies
description: A chocolate brownie or simply a brownie is a square or rectangular chocolate baked confection. Brownies come in a variety of forms and may be either fudgy or cakey, depending on their density.

name: Cherry Pie
description: Cherry pie is a pie baked with a cherry filling. Traditionally, cherry pie is made with sour cherries rather than sweet cherries.

name: Cookie
description: A cookie is a baked or cooked snack or dessert that is typically small, flat and sweet. It usually contains flour, sugar, egg, and some type of oil, fat, or butter.

name: Caesar
description: Salatmix mit Croutons und Parmesan Käse, Tomaten

name: Grüner
description: Salatmix mit Cherry Tomaten, Gurken, Oliven

name: Peporoni
description: Weißkraut und Karotten in einem Salatdressing

name: Broccoli Salad
description: You won’t miss the bacon in this lightened-up take on classic broccoli salad. Smoky roasted nuts take its place, adding delectable savory bites. A lightly creamy, sweet & tangy dressing takes the whole thing over the top.

name: Brussels Sprout Salad
description: Made with just 7 ingredients, it’s a breeze to put together, but a bright lemon dressing, Parmesan cheese, pine nuts, and dried cranberries make it zippy, fresh, and satisfying.

name: Easy Pasta Salad
description: As its name suggests, this one is a breeze to make. Just whisk together the zippy lemon dressing at the bottom of a big bowl, add the other ingredients, and toss to create a heavenly tangy/creamy/crunchy/fresh summer combo.
